br.uff.midiacom.ana.rule
Class NCLCompositeRule<T extends NCLElement,Eb extends NCLBindRule,Et extends NCLTestRule>

java.lang.Object
  br.uff.midiacom.ana.util.xml.XMLElementPrototype<T>
      br.uff.midiacom.ana.util.ncl.NCLElementPrototype<T>
          br.uff.midiacom.ana.util.ncl.NCLIdentifiableElementPrototype<T>
              br.uff.midiacom.ana.rule.NCLCompositeRule<T,Eb,Et>
Type Parameters:
T -
P -
I -
All Implemented Interfaces:
NCLElement<T>, NCLTestRule<T,Eb,Et>, ReferredElement<Eb>, XMLElement<T>
public class NCLCompositeRule<T extends NCLElement,Eb extends NCLBindRule,Et extends NCLTestRule>
extends NCLIdentifiableElementPrototype<T>
implements NCLTestRule<T,Eb,Et>

Class that represents a composite rule.
This element defines the attributes:

  • id - id of the composite rule element. This attribute is required.
  • operator - boolean operator relating the composite rule children elements. This attribute is required.

This element has as children the elements:
  • rule - element representing a simple rule inside the composite rule. The composite rule can have none or several rule elements.
  • compositeRule - element representing a composite rule inside the composite rule. The composite rule can have none or several composite rule elements.
Note that the composite rule must have at least one child element, which can be a simple or a composite rule.
